sections.heading: 1-2502 through 1-2521 of this title shall be known and may be cited as the "Oklahoma Emergency Response Systems Development Act"
sections.text: Added by Laws 1990, c. 320, ยง 5, emerg. eff. May 30, 1990. Amended by Laws 1999, c. 156, ยง 1, eff. Nov. 1, 1999.NOTE: Editorially renumbered from ยง 1-2401 of this title to
